title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Dream Comforter Bedding Ensemble at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: The Dream coverlet brings rich texture and chic style to your bed with a snake-skin inspired quilting pattern on a luxurious matte satin fabric. It looks great on its own, or pair it with the Dream comforter to create a truly elegant bedding ensemble. Thanks for watching.

asset.title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Dream Comforter Bedding Ensemble at Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.description: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-dream-coverlet/3243783 The Dream coverlet brings rich texture and chic style to ...
asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond

transcripts: So the dream comforter embedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with a cream sateen sheet set, featuring an embroidered Baroda stitch and warm tones at the hem of the sheet and the pillow sham. Adding a subtle dressmakers details. The euro shams and an ideal backdrop to the bed. They are 100 percent cotton velvet and toffee. The dream comforter and pillow shams are 100 percent cotton sateen with an ombre pattern in tones of copper, bronze, and grey's. The reverse of the comforter is printed with a subtle linear pattern. The coordinating pillow shams are finished with the same printed pattern as the comforter. The resulting bed is warm and dreamy. The decorative pillows accenting this beds suites are a rectangular matte copper sequence pillow with a faux linen reverse. A pearled colored velvet embroidered pillow with a fan coral pattern, and a metallic printed textured pillow and copper. The pillows are the key fashion elements to complete this look. The dream comforter and bedding is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection it is available exclusively online and select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
